title: Hohoemi no Nichijou
sinopse:
1. Hohoemi no Nichijou (Everyday Smile)
2. Hinata (Sunny Day)
3. Koibito no Kaikata (How to Own a Lover)
4. Omowaku no Shozai (Where Expectations Lie)
5. Bousou Shinka no Yukue (The Path to Reckless Evolution)
6. Azuma ni Aru Uchuu (Ocean in the East)
7. Omowaku no Shoutai
